lex.text: The location of the 11th Mississippi Infantry Monument is in Adams County, Pennsylvania. which has Franklin County to the west and Carroll County Maryland to the southeast. Cumberland County lies to the north with Frederick County, Maryland to the southwest. The 11th Mississippi Infantry Monument is a contributing property.

lex.text: Baku is the capital of Azerbaijan which has Artur Rasizade as its leader. The country is the location of the Baku Turkish Martyrs Memorial, designed in red granite and white marble by Huseyin Butuner and Hilmi Guner. The memorial is dedicated to the Ottoman army soldiers killed in the Battle of Baku.

lex.text: The Baku Turkish Martyrs' Memorial (designed by Huseyin Butuner and Hilmi Guner) is located in Baku, Azerbaijan. It is made from red granite and white marble. It is dedicated to the Ottoman Army Soldiers killed in the Battle of Baku. The native name for the memorial is Türk Şehitleri Anıtı. The leader of Azerbaijan is Artur Rasizade.
